rComments: Very approachable and enthusiastic teacher. Definitely worth taking any class taught by Raph. ....be prepared for donuts and milky ways along w some bad jokes, but all in all he has a good sense of humor and set up a fun class.

If you want to know more about Oceans, this is your man!  He's a little bit more into phytoplankton and random details that you probably won't be super interested in, but he does a decent job going over a LOT of info and making manageable homework.  Work with TAs and do practice tests and this class is "smooth sailing"
